Welcome to my website!

<div class="br2"></div>

I'm an **applied economist** and a **data analytics lecturer** at State University of New York at Geneseo.

<div class="br2"></div>

My research interest lies in **causal inference** with **machine learning**, **climate change**, and **the environment**. 

<div class="br2"></div>

My teaching interests are in **economics and data science**. My students use machine learning, econometrics, and data science tools to address important **business strategies**, **public policy**, and **individual decision-making**.
